betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§2Netherrack§f§f§f will allow you to obtain §2Sulfur§f, which is an important ingredient to obtain§2 Rubber§f.

It is obtained by right-clicking an §2Stone Barrel§f§f filled with §2Lava§f with§2 Redstone§f, but can be automated using§2 Item Pipes§f as well!

§3Hint: §fOres from Netherrack or Endstone give double the amount they normally give.
